You can request returns for most items listed as 'returnable' within the return window. Some items may be non-returnable. Check the specific product's return eligibility on the product detail page or our returns policy.

patterns: How to return a seller-fulfilled order?
How do I return a product sold by a third-party seller?
Can I return an item sold by a seller?
responses: For seller-fulfilled orders, you'll need to contact the seller to initiate returns. If the seller doesn't respond in 3 business days, you can file an A-to-z Guarantee claim for support.

patterns: How do I return an item?

How can I return a product?
responses: To return an item, sign in to your account, go to 'Your Orders', select the item to return, choose the reason, and proceed. If eligible for pickup, a return will be arranged. Otherwise, a self-return option will be provided.

patterns: How can I check my return status?
Where can I see the return progress?
responses: You can view your return status by locating the item under 'Your Orders' and selecting 'Return/Refund Status'.

patterns: Can I get my replacement to a different address?
Send my replacement to another address
responses: Replacements cannot be delivered to a different address. You may return the item for a refund and place a new order with the desired address.

patterns: When will I get my refund?
How long does a refund take?
How can I get my money back?
responses: Once your return is processed, the refund will be credited to your original payment method. The time it takes may vary based on your payment provider.
Certain categories are non-returnable, such as perishable goods, personal care items, or custom products. Please check the product detail page for return eligibility.
